banner.title: Create Banner
banner.subtitle: Generate stunning marketing banners with AI-powered Nano Banana Pro
banner.promptPlaceholder: E.g., A modern tech company banner with blue gradients, featuring 'SALE 50% OFF' text, minimalist style...
banner.emptyState: Your generated banner will appear here. Describe what you want to create and let AI bring it to life!
banner.generatingMessage: AI is crafting your perfect banner...
banner.errorEmptyPrompt: Please describe what you want to create
banner.errorGeneration: Failed to generate banner. Please try again.
banner.tipsContent: Be specific about colors, text content, style, and mood. Mention if you want specific elements like logos, products, or people. The more detail you provide, the better the result!
banner.historyEmptyHint: Your generated banners will appear here
banner.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this banner? This action cannot be undone.

settings.title: Settings
settings.deleteWarning: This action cannot be undone. Your account and all data will be permanently deleted.
